IncidentDef.label: dark settlement
IncidentDef.letterText:
A local settlement has stopped responding to communications.

There were reports of Reaper activity around that area, so many fear the worst.

Visiting this settlement could give you a clue about the Reaper strength in the area, but you should be prepared for a fight. Defeating the Reaper forces will allow you to loot any items you can find.

IncidentDef.label: dark settlement reclaimed
IncidentDef.letterText: A local settlement that had gone dark before has been taken back from the reapers by {0}.
